snippet: Mr. Hall, who helped to resuscitate Trans World Airlines, did not fare so well after moving to Eastern in the early 1960s.
abstract: Floyd D Hall, former airline pilot who rose to become chairman and chief executive of Eastern Airlines in the mid-1960s, dies at age 96.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hall, who helped to resuscitate Trans World Airlines, did not fare so well after moving to Eastern in the early 1960s.

headline.seo: Floyd D. Hall, Head of Eastern Airlines, Dies at 96
headline.main: Floyd D. Hall, Head of Eastern Airlines, Dies at 96
headline.print_headline: Floyd D. Hall, 96, Headed Eastern Airlines
